scripts.fashion:chrome: npx cross-env ENV=chrome npm run wdio -- --spec ./test/payever.fashion.js
scripts.santander:chrome: npx cross-env ENV=chrome npm run wdio -- --spec ./test/payever.santander.js
scripts.fashion:edge: npx cross-env ENV=edge npm run wdio --spec ./test/payever.fashion.js
scripts.santander:edge: npx cross-env ENV=edge npm run wdio --spec ./test/payever.santander.js
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm run fashion:chrome && npm run santander:chrome && allure open
scripts.clean: rimraf report && rimraf allure-report && rimraf allure-results && rimraf screenshots/failed-tests/*
